title: WTB: Low grade T206s with high eye appeal
author: majordanby

posts.post_title: WTB: Low grade T206s with high eye appeal
posts.post_content: Anyone have any T206's with great front side eye appeal but with low technical grades (because of paper loss, staining, a pin hole). I'm interested in buying or purchasing those with technical grades of VG and below, especially HOF'ers. PM me if you have any. thanks in advance.

Got an extra T206 Cobb Green.  Was purchased in the 1980s as a NM card and looks every bit of that.  However, PSA says that it is trimmed even though it measures full size.  Looking at the border cuts, I suppose that I agree - heck of a nice card though.

Send me a line of interested in discussing.

Regards,
Scott
